holidays.title: Appomattox Day
holidays.description: Dive into the story of the battle at Appomattox, the end of the Civil War.

holidays.title: Bataan Day
holidays.description: Join us to learn more about Bataan Day and its historical significance.

holidays.title: Education and Sharing Day
holidays.description: Education goes beyond obtaining a degree to shape a certain career.

holidays.title: International ASMR Day
holidays.description: Listen as we explain the amazing benefits of A.S.M.R. triggers.

holidays.title: Jenkins Ear Day
holidays.description: On this day, Robert Jenkins lost more than just the battle against the Spaniards!

holidays.title: Jumbo Day
holidays.description: It’s time to address the elephant in the room on Jumbo Day! Let’s learn more.

holidays.title: Kosovo Constitution Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about Kosovo Constitution Day this April 9.

holidays.title: National Bodhi Day
holidays.description: Today we look at this rare and distinctive name borne by people of both genders.

holidays.title: National Cherish an Antique Day
holidays.description: Do you ever think about the historical stories behind your family’s artifacts?

holidays.title: National Chicken Little Awareness Day
holidays.description: Chicken Little certainly takes the cake in the world of scaredy cats.

holidays.title: National Chinese Almond Cookie Day
holidays.description: They’re tasty, anti-inflammatory, healthy, and bring good luck… Chinese almond cookies are a one package deal!

holidays.title: National Former Prisoner Of War Recognition Day
holidays.description: Explore the significance of these courageous men and women in U.S. history.

holidays.title: National Gin and Tonic Day
holidays.description: This National Gin and Tonic Day, just chill and enjoy this refreshing drink.

holidays.title: National Mature Women’s Day
holidays.description: Women now know they can feel great about themselves at whatever age they are at.

holidays.title: National Name Yourself Day
holidays.description: Celebrate reinvention by trying on a new name for size. Who do you want to be?

holidays.title: National Unicorn Day
holidays.description: Take time out to celebrate a beautiful, horned, rainbow-printed mythical creature.

holidays.title: Vimy Ridge Day
holidays.description: Let’s explore one of the important battles of Canada — the Battle of Vimy Ridge.

holidays.title: Edinburgh Science Festival
holidays.description: Celebrate the scientific wonders of this world by participating in the Edinburgh Science Festival.

holidays.title: Gerard Way’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock singer, songwriter, and comic writer has something that cannot be duplicated.

holidays.title: Hugh Hefner’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hugh Hefner can rest knowing his legacy lives on and his impact transcends time.

holidays.title: Lala lalaleluu’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can certainly expect much more entertaining content from this TikTok star.

holidays.title: Lil Nas X’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Lil Nas X, the talented musician, the old town road is the ticket to success.

holidays.title: Tommyinnit’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is so much success in store for the YouTuber and gamer, Thomas Simons.
